newsitem.title: USA: Sullivan Dental to acquire Indiana firms.
newsitem.headline: Sullivan Dental to acquire Indiana firms.

text.p: Sullivan Dental Products Inc, which distributes dental supplies and dental equipment, said Tuesday it agreed to acquire two Fort Wayne, Ind., based dental supply and equipment companies.
Twenty-First Century Corp services the Indiana, Western Ohio, and Northern Kentucky markets and has annual sales of about $5 million.
Galt Inc services the Fort Wayne, Ind. market area and has annual sales of about $1.5 million.

"The combination of our existing sales force with those of both Twenty-First Century and Galt will make us the largest full service dental dealer in this market area," said Tim Sullivan, president of Sullivan Dental, in a news release.
Shares of Sullivan Dental were trading up 1/16 to 17-1/4.
